text:
Hi there, got a question re. blog template with tabber in sidebar:
Listing view, tabber OK: <https://bgu-ludwigshafen-4311915.hs-sites.com/blog>
Post view, nothing in tabber: <https://bgu-ludwigshafen-4311915.hs-sites.com/blog/sample-how-to-post-0>
Same template for both, same sidebar for both... Any idea what we did wrong?
would need to see the code, i think

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/COS-file-upload-to-root-push-notification/m-p/254118/highlight/true#M22516> anybody else here going to try and turn a HubSpot site into a PWA once this rolls out? :slightly_smiling_face:
Very cool. Having built a PWA on HS in the past. I’m excited for what this could bring
<@U25C6PU56>’s been working on something like this. Any tips Jesse?
